languages.text: "Пускай не вся моя собственность вернулась ко мне, я, тем не менее... удовлетворен. Мы можем идти. Ты сносно послужил{mf||а} моим желаниям, {name}". {n}Маражай нахально ухмыляется вам и кивает.{/n}

"Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пускай не вся моя собственность вернулась ко мне, я, тем не менее... удовлетворен. Мы можем идти. Ты сносно послужил{mf||а} моим желаниям, {name}". {n}Маражай нахально ухмыляется вам и кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Même si je n'ai pas récupéré toutes mes possessions, je suis... satisfait. Nous pouvons partir. Vous avez répondu à mes souhaits de manière acceptable, {name}. » {n}Marazhai vous lance un sourire insolent et hoche la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Même si je n'ai pas récupéré toutes mes possessions, je suis... satisfait. Nous pouvons partir. Vous avez répondu à mes souhaits de manière acceptable, {name}. » {n}Marazhai vous lance un sourire insolent et hoche la tête.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Aunque no se me ha devuelto toda mi propiedad, estoy... satisfecho. Podemos irnos. Hoy me has servido de forma tolerable, {name}». {n}Marazhai sonríe burlón y asiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Aunque no se me ha devuelto toda mi propiedad, estoy... satisfecho. Podemos irnos. Hoy me has servido de forma tolerable, {name}». {n}Marazhai sonríe burlón y asiente.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「すべてが俺様のもとに戻ったわけではないが、それでも満足している…もう行こう。俺様の願いによく応えてくれたな、{name}」{n}マラズハイは偉そうに微笑み、うなずく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「すべてが俺様のもとに戻ったわけではないが、それでも満足している…もう行こう。俺様の願いによく応えてくれたな、{name}」{n}マラズハイは偉そうに微笑み、うなずく。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “虽然并没有夺回我所有的财物，不过我还是……很满意。我们可以走了，你满足了我的愿望，我能容忍这样的结果，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋对你露出了无礼而得意的笑容，点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “虽然并没有夺回我所有的财物，不过我还是……很满意。我们可以走了，你满足了我的愿望，我能容忍这样的结果，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋对你露出了无礼而得意的笑容，点了点头。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Obwohl mir nicht mein gesamtes Eigentum zurückgegeben wurde, bin ich dennoch ... zufrieden. Wir können gehen. Ihr habt meine Wünsche ausreichend gut erfüllt, {name}." {n}Marazhai grinst dich anmaßend an und nickt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Obwohl mir nicht mein gesamtes Eigentum zurückgegeben wurde, bin ich dennoch ... zufrieden. Wir können gehen. Ihr habt meine Wünsche ausreichend gut erfüllt, {name}." {n}Marazhai grinst dich anmaßend an und nickt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Her ne kadar eşyalarımın tamamını geri alamasam da... Tatmin oldum. Gidebiliriz. Arzularımı doyurmaya oldukça güzel hizmet ettin {name}." {n}Marazhai sana küstahça gülümseyip başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Though not all my property has been restored to me, I am nevertheless... satisfied. We can go. You have served my wishes tolerably well, {name}." {n}Marazhai gives you an insolent smirk and nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Her ne kadar eşyalarımın tamamını geri alamasam da... Tatmin oldum. Gidebiliriz. Arzularımı doyurmaya oldukça güzel hizmet ettin {name}." {n}Marazhai, sana küstah bir şekilde gülümseyip başını sallıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
